text: "Stupid Girl" is a 1996 rock ballad. The song is performed by Garbage. It was released in February 1996. It was actually recorded in 1994, two years prior to release. The song has a drum sample of The Clash's single "Train in Vain". The song was nominated for two Grammy Awards: Best Rock Song and Best Rock Performance by a Duo or Group. Category:Rock songs Category:1996 songs Category:Garbage (band) songs
title: Stupid Girl (Garbage song)
